verses.name: Exodus 17:12
verses.text: But Moses’ hands were heavy; and they took a stone, and put it under him, and he sat thereon; and Aaron and Hur stayed up his hands, the one on the one side, and the other on the other side; and his hands were steady until the going down of the sun.

verses.name: Exodus 17:13
verses.text: And Joshua discomfited Amalek and his people with the edge of the sword.

verses.name: Exodus 17:14
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Write this for a memorial in a book, and rehearse it in the ears of Joshua: for I will utterly put out the remembrance of Amalek from under heaven.
